markdownRemark.html: Club de Tenis Indalo - This club has some of the best sports facilities in the province of Almeria. This includes 4 clay tennis courts, 8 hard surface tennis courts, 3 paddle courts, a warming fronton, a multipurpose court, gym, a football field, indoor and outdoor swimming pools a spa and a restaurant.
